name: synapse-a2a
description: Skills for Synapse A2A - Multi-agent communication framework enabling Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini to collaborate via Google A2A Protocol

plugins.name: synapse-a2a-skills
plugins.description: Complete skill set for Synapse A2A multi-agent framework including inter-agent communication, task delegation, file safety, and history management

plugins.name: synapse-communication
plugins.description: Inter-agent communication skill for sending messages, @agent routing, priority levels, and A2A protocol operations

plugins.name: synapse-delegation
plugins.description: Task delegation skill for automatic routing of tasks between agents with orchestrator/passthrough modes and file safety integration
